_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The power of faith [an5.2:7.3]: Faith in the Realized Oneâ€™s awakening
The Blessed One is perfected, a fully awakened Buddha
Supreme guide for those who wish to train
The power of conscience (a causal sequen: A noble disciple has a conscience
Conscientious about bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind
Conscientious about having any bad, unskillful qualities
The power of prudence (a causal sequence: Prudent when it comes to bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind
Prudent when it comes to acquiring any bad, unskillful qualities
The power of energy (a causal sequence): A mendicant lives with energy roused up for giving up unskillful qualities
Not slacking off when it comes to developing skillful qualities
The power of wisdom (a causal sequence): The wisdom of arising and passing away
Leads to the complete ending of suffering.
